column1: Uchi////Why?  A waiter's tasting menu is NOT the same as the chef's tasting menu.  I trust Uchi's chef taste buds
column2: but no offense but I do not trust my newly trained waiter's taste buds.  My coworker came here the night before
column3: let her waitress provide the tasting menu according to her suggestions
column4: and went away hungry and highly disappointed in her experience.
